data.text: @DBE_SA @ElijahMhlanga @ReginahMhaule @GovernmentZA @SADC_News why are the rewards listed in USD? almost like this competition was sponsored by an outside entity who has stake in the subject matter
@DBE_SA I'm grateful , THANK YOU FOR EVERYTHING ‚ù§
@DBE_SA @ElijahMhlanga @ReginahMhaule @GovernmentZA @SADC_News That was my salary,  until DOE ended my contract.
@DBE_SA @ElijahMhlanga @ReginahMhaule @GovernmentZA @SADC_News Good initiative. Is it $1k (R15k) or R1000?

In the 2021 installment, the top 3 winners' essays were submitted to the regional leg of the #SADCSchoolEssay, where Ms Mogadime was placed 8th.

You too could be a winner! Submit your entry by 14 April 2022 for a chance to have your essay considered for the regional finals. https://t.co/okAXsjCcBE
@DBE_SA @ElijahMhlanga @ReginahMhaule @GovernmentZA @SADC_News If only I was in high school.
